LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks.
LanguageData.Hopper.label: hopper
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand.label: hand sawmill
LanguageData.TableSawmillHand.description: A small muscle-powered sawmill for cutting logs into wood planks.
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric.label: electric sawmill
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric.description: A small electrically-powered sawmill for cutting logs into wood planks.
LanguageData.TableButcher.label: butcher table
LanguageData.TableButcher.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.
LanguageData.TableTailor.label: tailor's workbench
LanguageData.TableTailor.description: A workbench equipped for cloth refinement and clothing production.
LanguageData.TableMachining.label: machining table
LanguageData.TableMachining.description: A table and tools for assembling and disassembling machine components.
LanguageData.CookStove.label: cook stove
LanguageData.CookStove.description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals from simpler ingredients.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.label: stonecutter's table
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.label: electric smelter
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.Crematorium.label: crematorium
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponics basin
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow a few plants quickly.
